title: Who, Who, Who?
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 53 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 60L
description: Who? is the question asked again and again by a little owl as it tries to find friends with whom to fly, hunt, play, read, sing, and eat. Unfortunately, the most willing character is not the one the little owl was hoping for.
meta: alligator, eat, fly, hunt, owl, play, read, sing
Retell to clarify and understand the text
Reality and Fantasy : Identify elements of fantasy and reality
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime
Question Marks : Understand the use of question marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
